text: “Nan nɨghnɨzim kamakɨn. Nɨ Israelian nguibabar itir gumazamiziba bar, notɨn amadaghan Danɨn anabamɨn nguibamɨn ikegh, bar mangɨ sautɨn amadaghan Berseban nguibamɨn otogh, dar gumazamiziba bar men diaghtɨ, me izɨ uari akuvagham. Me ongarir dadarimɨn gigimɨn mɨn bar avɨrasemegham. Eghtɨ nɨ datɨrɨghɨn uabɨ men faragh mangɨva ia Devit ko mɨsogh.
